entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.4°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: W 21 km/h gust 39 km/h

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets mixed with snow changing to rain this evening then to a few flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
